alert.note: Alert for Bowie; Camp; Cass; Franklin; Marion; Morris; Red River; Titus; Upshur; Wood (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued October 05 at 3:59AM CDT until further notice by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Arkansas, including the following counties, Hempstead, Howard, Lafayette, Little River, Miller, Nevada and Sevier. Portions of southeast Oklahoma, including the following county, McCurtain. Portions of northeast Texas, including the following counties, Bowie, Camp, Cass, Franklin, Marion, Morris, Red River, Titus, Upshur and Wood. * WHEN...Until 7 AM CDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Rainfall tapers off across the impacted areas, however runoff continues and the rise of streams, creeks, bayous, and rivers will be ongoing into the morning and may result in additional flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Bowie; Camp; Cass; Franklin; Marion; Morris; Red River; Titus; Upshur; Wood
